member.name: M:SQL2HTML.moduleSQL2HTML.ObjectToString(System.Object)
member.summary: Transforms a database value to a String
member.remarks: Returns "" if the object is Nothing or DBNULL

member.name: M:SQL2HTML.moduleSQL2HTML.BooleanToEnglish(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transforms True | False to Yes | No

member.name: M:SQL2HTML.Field.ToHTML(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transforms an SQL field to HTML
member.remarks: "alternativeColor" is a .css setting. When it isn't set in styles.css, it won't be applied. The Primary Key fields will receive a "a name" property used for inpage linking The Foreign Key fields will receive a link to said inpage link

member.name: M:SQL2HTML.TableContainer.ToHTML
member.summary: Transforms multiple tables to HTML in valid XHTML 1.0

member.name: M:SQL2HTML.Table.ToHTML
member.remarks: The "class" attribute is used in the .css styling. See styles.css

member.name: P:SQL2HTML.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SQL2HTML.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SQL2HTML.My.Resources.Resources.logo
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:SQL2HTML.My.Resources.Resources.styles
T:SQL2HTML.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:SQL2HTML.Main.Main_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: You can put the name of the server you use the most here IgnorePrefix is used to excluse certain prefixes from the convertion
member.remarks: TODO: extract it to a config file.
